title: Problem-Solving Competency Development Program Based on Public Administration Case Studies (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of public administration and policy analysis, with basic statistical interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Provides case study content optimized for smartphone-based self-directed learning environments, emphasizing immediate applicability in professional settings

learning_goals: Learners apply theoretical knowledge to solve practical problems through public administration case analysis.
Learners construct logical analysis frameworks for data-driven decision-making under limited information conditions.
Learners independently interpret and derive key issues from mobile-delivered case studies within 20 minutes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
